abstract: The pianist Paul Lewis withdrew from several high-profile concerts in New York next month, citing his recovery from emergency surgery last week.

headline.main: Pianist Withdraws from Concerts, Citing Surgery
headline.print_headline: White Light Festival Loses Opening Pianist
